metadata.title: Create Fun Coloring Pages with AI | Coloring-Pages.app
metadata.description: Coloring-Pages.app is a NextJS boilerplate for building AI coloring page generators, Create amazing coloring pages with AI in seconds.
metadata.keywords: Coloring-Pages.app, AI Coloring Page Generator, NextJS Boilerplate
